Subjects: lovers, addresses to beloved; lovers, absence/separation of
_description: An English scribble to his lady dear — four short lines

BLRoy19Biv.Transcription:
Sin it is sothat I muste go& pass yow ffroomy lady
                    dere
BLRoy19Biv.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “Middle English Lyrics: Handlist of New Texts.” 
             Anglia
         83 (1965): 35-47: 46.
Sisam,  Celia,  and  Kenneth Sisam, eds.  
             The Oxford Book of Medieval English Verse.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1970: 566.
